question: The "Samana Bay" is located in which country?
explanation: The Samana Bay is located in the eastern coast of the island country of the Dominican Republic in the Hispaniola Islands of the Greater Antilles Archipelago in the West Indies-Caribbean region facing the Atlantic Ocean. This bay forms the mouth of the Yuna River which empties into the Atlantic Ocean. This bay is located along the boundary between the North American Plate and the Caribbean Plate and the Los Haitises National Park. This bay is an important nesting site for pelicans and frigate birds and breeding site for the Humpback Whales.
